name: Avoid Me (Joda Studios)
description:
This is Avoid Me. The objective is simple - dodge evil obstacles coming your way and keep yourself alive for as long as you can. You only have 3 lives (I sometimes allow you to have 4). If you use up all 3 lives (or 4), it will be GAME OVER!

Want to customise your character? You can earn money by getting a high score, and spend it in the shop to buy new skins to make your new character!

Want to have the best gamer graphics? If you have a powerful device, you can enable Post Processing (good graphics) in the Options menu. If this causes your device to lag, you can always change this setting back.

If you would like to buy money, you can go to the 'In-App Purchases' shop and buys some there. NOTE: It cost real money.

If you enjoy our game, make sure you leave a review!
